title: Inside Look
episode_desc: Series creator and writer Neil Cross, and Luther star, Idris Elba take you inside the first episode and inside the mind of Luther himself.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #1.1
episode_desc: Luther returns to work after a traumatic arrest to investigate the murder of a former child genius's parents, and quickly deduces that their daughter is responsible. However he is unable to find evidence to convict.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #1.2
episode_desc: A gunman is murdering uniformed police officers, and warns that there will be further shootings unless his terms are met. Luther is determined to flush the killer out.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #1.3
episode_desc: John Luther is on the trail of a satanic occult killer who kidnaps a woman but leaves her baby in the living room. Things get harder when a man accuses Luther of attacking him. Things take a grisly turn when the woman is found.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #1.4
episode_desc: When a serial killer goes on the rampage, Luther must put his personal life aside and delve inside the murderer's mind to discover what is driving him to kill so many girls, and why.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #1.5
episode_desc: Luther and the team are after the people involved in the violent kidnapping of Jessica Carrodus and they are in search of diamonds.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #1.6
episode_desc: Luther, suspected of murder, goes on the run to try and prove his innocence. With Alice's assistance, they set out together to exact revenge on the real killer.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #2.1
episode_desc: Still plagued by the death of his ex-wife, Luther returns to work to face a surreal and nightmarish case of a masked murderer determined to enter into folklore.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #2.2
episode_desc: Luther must rescue Ripley, abducted by Cameron, in time to prevent Cameron's final murderous set piece. But Jenny's ruthless and vengeful boss is demanding compensation for stealing her protege.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #2.3
episode_desc: As Luther's affection for Jenny grows, so does his determination to protect her and help her back on her feet. Baba, however, is determined to keep Luther on a tight leash.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #2.4
episode_desc: Luther's personal and professional life spirals out of control as he tries to cover up Toby's death and appease a suspicious Baba. He must also protect Jenny from any further harm.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #3.1
episode_desc: Luther investigates a case of a fetishist who is murdering women which is similar to an unsolved case from the 1980s. The team attempt to catch the copycat killer, whose murderous spree has only just started.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #3.2
episode_desc: Luther's date with Mary, and the promise of romance, is interrupted by the news of another murder. The killer has struck again - the number of victims is escalating fast.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #3.3
episode_desc: In what looks like a gangland crime - two hoodies are shot at close range. But an un-connected crime sees Luther make a un-connected connection that might provide the real answer to what happened.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #3.4
episode_desc: Marwood makes his vendetta personal - targeting Luther and those closest to him, raining destruction on everything he touches.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #4.1
episode_desc: While on a leave of absence, Luther is suddenly dragged back into his former life in London to battle the demons of his past and to stop a cannibal serial killer.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #4.2
episode_desc: Will a cold case unlock the mystery from Luther's past that is haunting him? The detective is forced to put himself and Emma in danger to stop the serial killer's end game.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #5.1
episode_desc: When a series of seemingly indiscriminate killings become ever more audacious Luther and new recruit DS Catherine Halliday are confounded by a tangle of leads and misdirection that appears designed to protect an untouchable corruption.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #5.2
episode_desc: Luther must confront a demon from his past, as the police and Cornelius converge on his home. Halliday is convinced the body in the morgue isn't that of the killer.
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #5.3
episode_desc: Luther's friend is in danger and a young woman has been kidnapped by the killer. As revenge threatens to consume him the detective must choose who to save and who can't he bear to lose?
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.

title: Episode #5.4
episode_desc: Luther's left reeling by tragic events but must race to save the others from a killer determined to complete his macabre masterpiece. Can the troubled DCI come to terms with the problems that threaten his career, life and those around him?
show_desc: DCI John Luther is a near-genius murder detective whose brilliant mind can't always save him from the dangerous violence of his passions.
